title: Clément Desableau
subtitle: Looking for a Vue web developer job

objective.title: Objective
objective.content: French engineer in computer science. I love to create. I love to learn. Looking for a job in software engineering.

juniorHighschool.name: Pierre de Ronsard Junior High School

eisti.name: EISTI (Graduate School in Computer Science and Mathematics Engineering)

highschool.title: High School
highschool.description: Baccalauréat (equivalent to A levels) in Sciences with highest honours, European section

prepa.title: Prepa
prepa.description: Two-years post secondary programme in preparation for nation-wide competitive entrance exams to french engineering

engineering.title: Engineering School
engineering.description: Three years in Engineering school in Computer and Information Sciences. Specialized in Cyber Security for last year

eisti-TIPE.title: TIPE - Making an AI for the board game Quoridor
eisti-TIPE.description: Use of C# language and Unity Game Engine

eisti-turtle.title: L-system generator in python
eisti-turtle.description: Use of the turtle python library in order to generate Lindenmayer systems from configuration files. It supports parametric, context sensitive, and stochastic grammars

eisti-bezier.title: Bezier curves editor in python
eisti-bezier.description: Use of the tkinter python library in order to create a GUI allowing user to draw bezier curves. It also supports other curves like splines, b-splines and nurbs

eisti-oh-hell.title: Implementation of the Oh Hell card game
eisti-oh-hell.description: Use of the Ocaml programming language to implement a TUI version of the Oh Hell card game

eisti-TSP.title: Approach of the TSP (Traveling Salesman Problem)
eisti-TSP.description: Implementation of the Little Algorithm, using the Ocaml programming  language

eisti-LabVIEW.title: Creation of a synthesizer in LabVIEW
eisti-LabVIEW.description: Creation of a triple oscillator synthesizer using the LabVIEW visual programming language. It also features effects like delay, reverb, or ring modulation

eisti-footbet.title: Development of a website to bet for the football world cup 2018
eisti-footbet.description: Website selected by school among other projects, and hosted on its servers during the event

eisti-vdsa.title: Development of a dashboard to monitor sells
eisti-vdsa.description: Use of web technologies to implement a dashboard, meeting the real needs of the VDSA enterprise

eistikathon-1.title: Winner of the EISTIKATHON, a hackathon organized by CAPFI and EISTI
eistikathon-1.description: 24-H hackathon where teams develop an accessibility application to help disabled people
duties: Delivering work under very strict time constraints

eisti-internship-ing1.title: First programmation internship at XWikiSAS
eisti-internship-ing1.description: Development on the Open Source software CryptPad.

eistikathon-2.title: Participation of the second edition of the EISTIKATHON, hackathon organized by CAPFI and EISTI
eistikathon-2.description: Development of an application for reporting incidents, and keep track of the intervention

eisti-internship-ing2.title: Second programmation internship at XWikiSAS
eisti-internship-ing2.description: Implementing a real-time data aggregator component on the Open Source software XWiki
duties: Designing UI/UX interfaces, accounting for technical constraints

eisti-alternance.title: Work-student at XWikiSAS
eisti-alternance.description: Continuing the development of the real-time data aggregator component from previous internship. Starting to work in Client team.

google-hash-code-2021.title: Participation at the 2021 Google Hash Code hackathon

xwiki-cdi.title: R&D Engineer at XWikiSAS
xwiki-cdi.description: Working in Client Team, customizing software to meet client needs. Making patches for the main software.
duties: Developing interfaces based on provided mockups
Delivering work under strict time and deliverable constraints
Adapting features to client needs with quick iterations
Collaborating in Agile methodology, coordinating across teams

music.title: Music
duties: Cellist at the Orsay semi-professional orchestra since 2022
Bassist in a band performing live on occasion
Member of the music association committee at my engineering school during my studies

projects.title: Programing - personal projects
projects.description: I program a lot in my spare time, which allows me to experiment, learn, and strengthen my expertise in the web ecosystem, particularly in Vue.js. Some projects are public on my github.

projects-cv.title: CV
projects-cv.description: I made my CV using Vue because why not

projects-enalion.title: Enalion website
projects-enalion.description: Website for my band Enalion. Uses SSG for better DX and faster loading times.

projects-amalgamemusic.title: Amalgame website
projects-amalgamemusic.description: Website for my music project Amalgame
